original_text: And when we had all fallen to the ground, I heard a voice saying to me in the Hebrew language, ‘Saul, Saul, why are you persecuting me? It is hard for you to kick against the goads.’
korean_text: 우리가 다 땅에 엎드러지매 내가 소리를 들으니 히브리 말로 이르되 사울아 사울아 네가 어찌하여 나를 박해하느냐 가시채를 뒷발질하기가 네게 고생이니라

sentences.original_text: And when we had all fallen to the ground,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리가 다 땅에 엎드렸을 때,

sentences.original_text: saying to me in the Hebrew language,
It is hard for you to kick against the goads.’
